hypothesis_content.title: Binance APR Offer Momentum Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: Following Binance's 20% APR offer announcement for USD1, the initial surge in USD1 market cap will be followed by a predictable mean reversion in its price relative to other stablecoins (USDT/USDC) within 48-72 hours, as arbitrage capital flows in and the initial speculative premium fades.
hypothesis_content.rationale: High APR offers attract immediate speculative buying, creating a temporary price premium. This creates a near-riskless arbitrage opportunity (buy USDT, swap to USD1, deposit for APR, hedge price risk) that sophisticated players will execute, driving the premium back to parity. The 48-72 hour window captures the institutional settlement cycle.
entry_conditions: USD1/USDT price on Binance spot > 1.005 (0.5% premium)
24h volume of USD1/USDT pair > 3x its 30-day average
Time since Binance APR announcement > 12 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: USD1/USDT price returns to within 0.1% of 1.000

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: USD1 premium sustains >0.3% for >5 days, indicating structural demand shift rather than temporary arbitrage.
